agileforprojectmanagers.description_text: The role of the project manager with agile differs significantly from traditional project management in that there is minimal up-front planning. This book will help project managers from any industry transition to agile project management. The book focuses on the project management component of agility, concentrating on industry standards, certifications, and being agile. The book's focus is in alignment with the Project Management Institute (PMI) Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) credential-making it ideal for anyone preparing for the PMI-ACP exam.

makingprojectswork_effectivestakeholdera.description_text: This book provides a framework for understanding and managing factors required for achieving successful project and program outcomes. It presents guidelines to help readers develop an understanding of governance and its connection to strategy as the starting point for decisions on what work needs to be done. The book describes how to craft appropriate communication strategies to develop and maintain successful relationships with stakeholders. It highlights the strengths and weaknesses of existing project controls and outlines effective communication techniques for managing expectations and acquiring the support required for successful delivery.
makingprojectswork_effectivestakeholdera.human_name: Making Projects Work: Effective Stakeholder and Communication Management

asimpleguidetotechnologyandanalytics.description_text: Richly furnished with over 200 illustrations, photos and with minimal equations, A Simple Guide to Technology and Analytics is a ready reference book for those times when you don’t really understand the technology and analytics being talked about. It explains complicated topics such as automated character recognition in a very simple way, and has simple exercises for the reader to fully understand the technology (with answers at the back). It even has explanations on how home appliances work, which are very useful the next time you go shopping for a microwave or TV.
asimpleguidetotechnologyandanalytics.human_name: A Simple Guide to Technology and Analytics

businesscontinuityplanning_aprojectmanag.description_text: This book explains how to apply project management to implement and maintain business continuity. With a major emphasis on building business preparedness plans, it covers the basics of project management, risk management, business continuity, and business preparedness. Presenting a proven approach that firms can follow to become more resilient, the book provides diagrams, checklists, and other tools to help readers determine what they need to do for their firm to withstand or recover from the next emergency, disaster, or catastrophic event to impact their organization.
businesscontinuityplanning_aprojectmanag.human_name: Business Continuity Planning: A Project Management Approach

evolvingtoolboxforcomplexprojectmanageme.description_text:
This book enhances learning about complex project management principles and practices through introduction and discussion of a portfolio of tools presented as an evolving toolbox. Throughout the book, industry practitioners examine the toolsets that are part of the toolbox to develop a broader understanding of complex project management challenges and the available tools to address them.

This approach establishes a dynamic, structured platform for a comprehensive analysis and assessment of the modern, rapidly changing, multifaceted business environment to teach the next generation of project managers to successfully cope with the ever increasing complexity of the 21st century.
evolvingtoolboxforcomplexprojectmanageme.human_name: Evolving Toolbox for Complex Project Management

retainingexpertknowledge_whattokeepinana.description_text: This book explores the problem of the loss of corporate expertise. It explains how to meet the challenge of capturing hard-to-replicate knowledge, skills and attitudes from legacy employees and packaging it in a way to reach new generations of workers. Finally, the book presents a methodology for efficiently capturing critical corporate information in ways that make the process relatively simple and painless both for the subject matter experts and the people tasked with capturing their knowledge. This book gives you a way to analyze your company and identify your most critical experts whose knowledge must be preserved for business continuity.
retainingexpertknowledge_whattokeepinana.human_name: Retaining Expert Knowledge: What to Keep in an Age of Information Overload

resourceproportionalsoftwaredesignforeme.description_text: This book raises developer awareness to the central principles and benefits of resource proportional software design in creating an antidote to the problem of run-time bloat in deeply layered software stacks. It equips developers to practice resource proportional software design using the principles to build efficient software without compromising flexibility. The book further motivates similar practices in a discussion on implications for emerging technologies for system designers and provides an outline of open research questions for academic researchers.
resourceproportionalsoftwaredesignforeme.human_name: Resource Proportional Software Design for Emerging Systems

theciosguidetorisk.description_text: In an age of globalization, widely distributed systems and rapidly advancing technological change, IT professionals and their managers must understand that risk is inherent in all technological projects. The key to project success is to identify risk and then deal with it. The CIO's Guide to Risk addresses the many faces of risk, whether it be in procurement, development, innovation or even social media. Risk management planning, risk identification, qualitative and quantitative risk analysis, contingency planning and risk monitoring and control are all addressed on a macro as well as micro level.

innovationfactory.description_text: The Innovation Factory takes a fresh look at the fine art of breakthrough innovation. Written by an experienced researcher and scholar and by an experienced inventor and entrepreneur, it marries theory with practical examples focusing on the Concept-Knowledge (C-K) Theory developed by the prestigious school Mines ParisTech. Elmar Mock, the creative engineering force behind the Swatch, passionately tells how he helped to create this revolutionary product that saved the Swiss watch industry in the 1980s. Gilles Garel, a professor of management, relates this tale of epic innovation to C-K Theory.

enterprisearchitecturefordigitalbusiness.description_text: Enterprise Architecture (EA) is the most essential fabric of an enterprise. However, EA also transcends and transforms technology and moves it into business space. Therefore, EA needs to be discussed in an integrated, holistic, and comprehensive manner. This book focuses on preparing all organizations large and small, and those wishing to move into them, for the impact of leveraging emerging, disruptive, and innovative technologies within the EA framework.
enterprisearchitecturefordigitalbusiness.human_name: Enterprise Architecture for Digital Business: Integrated Transformation Strategies

modernmanagementandleadership_bestpracti.description_text:
In one modest-sized volume, this book offers three valuable sets of knowledge. It provides best practice guidance on virtually every large-scale task a modern manager may be involved in from recruiting and hiring to onboarding and leading teams, and from employee engagement and retention to performance management and working with difficult employees.

The book also explains the essential concepts and practice of a range of effective leadership styles including (but not limited to) servant leadership, crisis leadership, change agent leadership, and diversity and inclusion leadership.
modernmanagementandleadership_bestpracti.human_name: Modern Management and Leadership: Best Practice Essentials with CISO/CSO Applications

itgovernanceandinformationsecurity_guide.description_text: In this new book, The authors share their experience to help you navigate today's dangerous information security terrain and take proactive steps to measure your company IT Governance and information security maturity and prepare your organization to survive, thrive and keep your data safe. It aspires to provide a relevant reference for Executive Managers, CISOs, Cybersecurity professionals, Engineers, and Researchers interested in exploring and implementing efficient IT governance and information security strategies.
itgovernanceandinformationsecurity_guide.human_name: IT Governance and Information Security: Guides, Standards, and Frameworks

managementlessonsfromthegreatexplorers.description_text: This book looks at famous and, in some cases, infamous explorers to discuss and analyze the management practices (even though they may have never called them as such) that they used before, during, and even after their expeditions. Each chapter presents the historical background about the explorers and the details about their expeditions. Each chapter also discusses of the challenges they faced when planning and executing their expeditions as well as their successes and failures from a management perspective. The final chapter provides lessons learned.
managementlessonsfromthegreatexplorers.human_name: Management Lessons from the Great Explorers

innovatorsimperative_rapidtechnologyadop.description_text: Based on research conducted at Villanova University’s School of Business, the book describes technology adoption in the 21st century. The innovator/early adopter/early majority/late majority/laggard innovation diffusion model first popularized by Everett Rogers in1962 is unrecognizable today. Even the rapid prototyping adoption models of the late 1990s have collapsed. This book presents a technology adoption process that is driven by competitive fear, speed and digital transformation. It is a process that is inexpensive, indiscriminate and completely disconnected from adoption categories or bell curves.
innovatorsimperative_rapidtechnologyadop.human_name: The Innovator's Imperative: Rapid Technology Adoption for Digital Transformation

sustainabilityinprojectmanagement.description_text:
This book presents a new approach to the issue of project management, showing how it can be approached through the lens of sustainability. The focus is on a functional approach to the subject, allowing management and business to implement the methodology discussed. Topics discussed include sustainable planning, sustainable organizing, sustainable leading and sustainable controlling. The authors use their combined experience in the area to inform their novel approach.

The book will be especially useful for people who are project managers, members of project teams and other project stakeholders.
sustainabilityinprojectmanagement.human_name: Sustainability in Project Management: A Functional Approach

practicalguidetoitproblemmanagement.description_text: Whilst the concept of IT problem management is well understood, doing it in practice is much harder. Aligned with such well known frameworks as ITIL, This book offers practical advice on how to tackle real problems in complex environments. Each chapter explores a different aspect of problem solving and is illustrated with real life case studies that bring the discipline to life and make it easier for the reader to apply the principles to their own situation. This book is aimed at IT professionals and managers who face problems in their daily work.
practicalguidetoitproblemmanagement.human_name: Practical Guide to IT Problem Management

everychildareader.description_text:
Donations to support Every Child a Reader are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Every Child a Reader is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to instilling a lifelong love of reading in children. Every Child a Reader creates and supports programs that strive to make the reading and enjoyment of children’s books an essential part of America’s educational and social aims and enhance public perception of the importance of reading. ECAR’s programs include Children’s Book Week, a nationwide celebration of books and reading, and  the longest-running national literacy initiative in the country; The Children’s Choice Book Awards, the only national book awards program where the winning titles are selected by kids and teens of all ages; and The National Ambassador for Young People’s Literature Program, the country’s “Children’s Literature Laureate”. Learn more at cbcbooks.org/about/every-child-a-reader/.

iotarchitectsguidetoattainablesecurityan.description_text: This book explores how to secure the future state of the Internet of Things. Looking at an imminent future filled with computers that also moonlight as "things", the guide dissects the present and future threats to assets, digital and otherwise. To avoid the significant technical debt which is likely to manifest as IoT adoption increases, it’s important to think ahead. To that effect, the book examines how to design IoT solutions that provide end-to-end security and privacy at scale, delves into IoT economy from the perspective of both defenders and attackers, and discusses the implications of security usability.
iotarchitectsguidetoattainablesecurityan.human_name: The IoT Architect's Guide to Attainable Security and Privacy

strategicstakeholderengagement.description_text: New government policy and regulation affect the environments in which organisations operate, bringing both risks potential opportunities. A key question is whether organisations are engaging with decision-makers and other key actors as effectively as they could. Are they managing to influence the policy and regulatory regime that shapes the markets in which they operate? Even more fundamentally, do they know who they should be interacting with or understand the formal and informal processes whereby they can present their concerns, views and ideas? Strategic Stakeholder Engagement and Communication: A Voice Behind the Curtain addresses these important questions.

itprojecthealthchecks_drivingsuccessfuli.description_text: This book provides a health-check framework to evaluate the status of IT projects and programs and to build out an actionable roadmap to improve the resulting business value and benefits. Whether a project is in red, yellow, or green status, this book provides information that can drive a better outcome and value for the investment in a project initiative. This is the book’s key differentiator. Using this book, any project stakeholder can improve a project’s outcome regardless of how well or poor the project is running. Projects that are performing well can benefit from this book to improve benefits to business, while projects that are under stress can be brought back to green status.
itprojecthealthchecks_drivingsuccessfuli.human_name: IT Project Health Checks: Driving Successful Implementation and Multiples of Business Value

metadatamatters.description_text: Metadata increases the return on investment of content systems by unlocking the potential to ingest, discover, and distribute assets. The book outlines the requirements for collecting data, and the guideposts for protecting and leveraging large datasets. It shows how metadata can empower content and digital operations from creation to distribution. Metadata development is a strategic imperative in the endeavor to effectively manage and exploit a company’s content and knowledge. The successful implementation of any content-related strategy for data, digital assets, or text requires implementation of a holistic metadata schema that is supported by technology, people, and process.

mindthetechgap_addressingtheconflictsbet.description_text: IT and cybersecurity teams have had a long-standing battle between functionality and security. To understand where the problem lies, this book will explore the different job functions, goals, relationships, and other factors that may impact how IT and cybersecurity teams interact. With different levels of budget, competing goals, and a history of lack of communication, there is a lot of work to do to bring these teams together. The goal is to identify the problems in your own team or organization and apply the principles within to improve how teams communicate, collaborate, and compromise.
mindthetechgap_addressingtheconflictsbet.human_name: Mind the Tech Gap: Addressing the Conflicts between IT and Security Teams

businessrecoveryandcontinuityinamegadisa.description_text: The COVID-19 Pandemic has changed the entire world to levels that were not even thought of before. Many businesses, especially here in the United States were completely caught off guard by this, and as a result, they had no concrete plans put into place, from a cybersecurity standpoint, in how to deal with it. This publication is intended to be a how-to book to fully prepare the CIOs and CISOs for the next disaster to happen, whether natural or manmade, with the various lessons that have been learned thus far from COVID-19.
businessrecoveryandcontinuityinamegadisa.human_name: Business Recovery and Continuity in a Mega Disaster: Cybersecurity Lessons Learned from the COVID-19 Pandemic

saywhatcommunicatewithtactandimpact_what.description_text: The book is a guide for professionals who want to interact proactively and persuasively with those they work with, audit, or review. It describes techniques that could be used during virtual, in-person, telephone or video conferences (as opposed to emails, workpapers, and reports). It provides everyone (newer associates in particular) with the interpersonal skills needed to (1) develop and build relationships with their internal constituents and clients, (2) facilitate conversations and discussions before and during meetings, (3) handle impromptu questions with confidence and executive presence, and make positive first impressions.
saywhatcommunicatewithtactandimpact_what.human_name: Say What!? Communicate with Tact and Impact: What to say to get results at any point in an audit

whattodowhenyougethacked_apractitionersg.description_text: This book teaches you everything that you need to know about preparing your company for a potential data breach. We begin by talking about what the latest cybersecurity threats and attacks are that your company needs to be prepared for. Once we establish that we go into the different phases of the incident response lifecycle based on the NIST framework. This will teach you how to properly prepare and respond to cybersecurity incidents so that you can be sure to minimize the damage and fulfill all of your legal requirements during a cyberattack. This book is meant for the everyday business owner and makes these concepts simple to understand and apply.
whattodowhenyougethacked_apractitionersg.human_name: What To Do When You Get Hacked: A Practitioner's Guide to Incident Response in the 21st Century

managingbusinessprojects.description_text: This book is written for the project manager as well as the many other stakeholders involved in business projects. It gives basic techniques that can be adapted to any business scenario. By following certain simple methods, and engaging with business stakeholders, a project manager's probability of success is vastly improved. This guide shows how to do what is essential with adequate quality, but to do it consistently only possible with simple, flexible, techniques presented in this book.

bigdataforbigdecisions.description_text: While every enterprise aspires to become 100% data-driven, the Gartner Group estimates over 80% of all analytics projects fail to deliver intended value. This is a practitioner's guide for creating step-by-step a transformational roadmap, prioritize Big Data for big decisions--the key-decisions that influence 90% of business outcomes, and actually deliver value from analytics investments. For those CIOs struggling to explain the business-value from analytics, this book presents a methodology for assured success in deriving intended value from investments into analytics, and improvements in quality of decisions.
bigdataforbigdecisions.human_name: Big Data for Big Decisions: Building a Data-Driven Organization

strategicitgovernance20_howciossucceedat.description_text: Strategic IT Governance 2.0: How CIOs Succeed at Digital Innovation explains how IT executives can take the lead and successfully drive digital transformation initiatives and its associated projects. The book presents the Strategic IT Governance 2.0 model that focuses on project alignment, process reinvention, and leadership excellence. It is filled with case studies of the model’s implementation, giving practical insight how organizations have successfully executed digital transformation.
strategicitgovernance20_howciossucceedat.human_name: Strategic IT Governance 2.0: How CIOs Succeed at Digital Innovation

protectinginformationassetsanditinfrastr.description_text: Today, many businesses and corporations are moving their on premises IT Infrastructure to the Cloud. There are numerous advantages to do doing so, including on-demand service, scalability, and fixed pricing. As a result, the Cloud has become a popular target of cyber-based attacks. Although an ISP is often charged with keeping virtual infrastructure secure, it is not safe to assume this. Back-up measures must be taken. This book explains how to guard against cyber-attacks by adding another layer of protection to the most valuable data in the Cloud: customer information and trade secrets.
protectinginformationassetsanditinfrastr.human_name: Protecting Information Assets and IT Infrastructure in the Cloud

aguidetoitcontracting_checkliststoolsand.description_text: This book presents a distillation of the most critical business and legal lessons learned from decades of drafting and negotiating virtually every type of technology-related agreement. Readers can quickly access information on almost every type of technology agreement and immediately understand what the agreement is intended to do, the key business and legal issues that must be addressed, tips and best practices for negotiation of certain terms of the agreement, and the most common pitfalls that are typically encountered. Readers are given tools to more intelligently address issues in technology contracting and how to negotiate these types of agreements.
aguidetoitcontracting_checkliststoolsand.human_name: A Guide to IT Contracting: Checklists, Tools, and Techniques

everychildareader.description_text:
Donations to support Every Child a Reader are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Every Child a Reader is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to instilling a lifelong love of reading in children. Every Child a Reader creates and supports programs that strive to make the reading and enjoyment of children’s books an essential part of America’s educational and social aims and enhance public perception of the importance of reading. ECAR’s programs include Children’s Book Week, a nationwide celebration of books and reading, and  the longest-running national literacy initiative in the country; The Children’s Choice Book Awards, the only national book awards program where the winning titles are selected by kids and teens of all ages; and The National Ambassador for Young People’s Literature Program, the country’s “Children’s Literature Laureate”. Learn more at cbcbooks.org/about/every-child-a-reader/.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: IT Manager's Toolkit by Taylor & Francis
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Captain a tight & secure IT ship
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get The CIO's Guide to Risk, Evolving Toolbox for Complex Project Management, The IoT Architect's Guide to Attainable Security and Privacy, Big Data for Big Decisions: Building a Data-Driven Organization, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Learn the skills and knowledge you need to lead in information technology with this bundle of elite courses from Taylor & Francis. Inside this 25+ curriculum, you’ll get expert insights from courses like The IoT Architect's Guide to Attainable Security and Privacy, Big Data for Big Decisions: Building a Data-Driven Organization, Evolving Toolbox for Complex Project Management, and more. Deepen your understanding whether you’re a newer manager or a seasoned professional, and help support Every Child a Reader with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Taylor & Francis Group

basic_data.human_name: Build Smarter: The Low/No-Code Development Essentials
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Learn to build smarter with our hottest no-code software bundle from the experts at Packt! Perfect for experts and novices—get tools like Power Automate - A Guide to Power Automate Desktop, MindStudio Mastery - Automate Workflows and Build Gen AI Apps, and The Complete Masterclass on PL-900 Certification—and help support Alzheimer’s Research UK with your purchase!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: No code—no problem!
basic_data.description:
No code—no problem! Learn to build smarter with our hottest no-code software bundle from the experts at Packt! Perfect for experts and novices—get tools like Power Automate - A Guide to Power Automate Desktop, MindStudio Mastery - Automate Workflows and Build Gen AI Apps, and The Complete Masterclass on PL-900 Certification—and help support Alzheimer’s Research UK with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $1,272. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. All content in this bundle can be redeemed on the Packt website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Alzheimer’s Research UK. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

alzheimersresearchuk.description_text:
Without effective treatments, one in three children born today will die with dementia. Today, there are no dementia survivors but research can change this.

Alzheimer’s Research UK is the UK's leading dementia research charity, dedicated to causes, diagnosis, prevention, treatment and cure. Backed by our passionate scientists and supporters, we’re challenging the way people think about dementia, uniting the big thinkers in the field and funding the innovative science that will deliver a cure.

makeappswithchatgptandgenerativeai.description_text:
ChatGPT is a language generation model developed by OpenAI. Its newest form, Davinci, is behind the ChatGPT program we all know. It grew popular in December 2022 after people started using it and seeing how amazingly it deals with prompt-response completion questions.

This course’s objective is to build applications and solutions with ChatGPT. You will do that by learning more about OpenAI and ChatGPT and how to use their APIs in your platforms. You will create a serverless function that can take ChatGPT prompts and return responses—the first step to integrate your ChatGPT into your app. You will learn to incorporate the ChatGPT API into many platforms. Connect to OpenAI API and create Azure functions that leverage ChatGPT. Finally, you will develop complete applications and solution examples, including CoverLetterCreator, StockPhotoPPT, PolitelySayNo, and TravelPlan.

Upon completion, you will use ChatGPT to increase your productivity and build real-life solutions and applications from scratch using ChatGPT. You will leverage this unique AI model with other OpenAI models such as DALL-E to create business software independently. You will integrate the API into different platforms, including Outlook, Power Apps, Power Automate, Airtable, and Bubble, and build real-life applications and solutions from scratch.

All resources are available at: https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Make-Apps-with-ChatGPT-and-Generative-AI
makeappswithchatgptandgenerativeai.human_name: Make Apps with ChatGPT and Generative AI

harnessingopensourcellmsandchatgptwithmi.description_text:
Welcome to the captivating world of Large Language Models (LLMs)! This course is designed to guide you through the fascinating landscape of LLMs, encompassing both no-code and low-code solutions powered by Python. We begin by equipping you with the necessary software to operate these models locally, enabling you to explore various open-source models, including Google’s Gemma:7b and Llama3, without the need for an internet connection.

In the advanced section, you will delve into using Python for streaming responses from open-source LLMs and integrating with the official OpenAI API. The course covers low code solutions for streaming ChatGPT responses and introduces function calling within ChatGPT models. You'll also learn about the llama3 model and how to interface it with Python for web applications. Throughout the course, you'll gain experience fetching responses in both batch and streaming modes, and we will jointly develop a small web frontend using Streamlit for our streaming LLM API.

By the end of the course, you'll be equipped to run open-source LLMs locally and leverage their capabilities to the fullest.
harnessingopensourcellmsandchatgptwithmi.human_name: Harnessing Open Source LLMs and ChatGPT with Minimal Code

ai-900_microsoftazureaifundamentalsvideo.description_text:
Prepare for the AI-900 Certification Exam by covering the complete exam syllabus as updated in April 2021 with sample questions with this course.

We will be covering the following 5 domains in the course:

  • Domain 1: We will cover the identification of features in common AI workloads and guiding principles for responsible AI.
  • Domain 2: We will cover the identification of common machine learning variants, description of core machine learning concepts, identification of core risks in the creation of a machine learning solution, and description of capabilities of no-code machine learning with Azure machine learning.
  • Domain 3: We will cover the identification of common types of computer vision solutions and the identification of Azure tools and services for computer vision tasks.
  • Domain 4: We will cover the identification of features in common NLP workload scenarios and learn how to identify Azure tools and services for NLP workloads.
  • Domain 5: We will cover the identification of common use cases for conversational AI and will be identifying Azure services for conversational AI.

By the end of this course, you will be ready to appear for your AI-900 exam.

All the resources for this course are available at: https://github.com/PacktPublishing/AI-900-Microsoft-Azure-AI-Fundamentals-Video-Course-and-Ques
ai-900_microsoftazureaifundamentalsvideo.human_name: AI-900: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals Video Course + Ques

no-codemachinelearningusingamazonawssage.description_text:
AWS is the #1 cloud-based tool used industry-wide for machine learning projects. You do not need advanced coding expertise that is generally required in the field of machine learning. Nowadays, machine learning models that usually take many days to build are available very quickly in just a few minutes with the help of SageMaker Canvas.

SageMaker Canvas has a small learning curve and you can pick up even advanced concepts very quickly. It is also available as part of AWS Free Tier.nnThis course is created with students from various backgrounds in mind. Therefore, we start with the fundamentals and work our way up to more advanced topics. In addition, we will work on four projects in the course itself, from beginning to end. By providing you with in-depth knowledge and the necessary hands-on experience on this newly introduced cloud-based ML tool, this course will help you become a machine learning expert and enhance your skills. You won’t need any advanced coding knowledge to complete projects that are based on real-world industry problems. Guidance is offered beyond the tool—you will not only learn the software but also important machine learning principles.

By the end of this course, you will be able to build your own machine learning model and get accurate predictions without writing any code using AWS SageMaker Canvas.

All the resources and datasets for this course are available at: https://github.com/PacktPublishing/No-Code-Machine-Learning-Using-Amazon-AWS-SageMaker-Canvas
no-codemachinelearningusingamazonawssage.human_name: No-Code Machine Learning Using Amazon AWS SageMaker Canvas

masterlangchainwithno-codetools_flowisea.description_text:
Dive into the dynamic world of LangChain and discover how to use it to create AI-driven workflows, applications, and tools. This course starts by introducing you to the core concepts of LangChain and why it’s an essential tool for modern AI development. You’ll begin with the installation and configuration of Flowise and LangFlow, two critical UI tools that simplify LangChain’s capabilities.

Once set up, you'll move on to creating various types of prompt templates and AI chains, learning how to apply them in real-world scenarios. The course then delves deeper into advanced functionalities, including memory systems and summarization use cases, crucial for building dynamic and responsive AI systems. Along the way, you’ll explore the fascinating world of agents, learning how to build and deploy them to automate tasks within LangChain.

Finally, you’ll gain insights into integrating LangChain with external no-code platforms like Bubble, allowing for seamless app creation without needing extensive coding expertise. By the end of this course, you'll have a thorough understanding of how to use LangChain, Flowise, and LangFlow to create, deploy, and scale powerful AI applications and workflows.
masterlangchainwithno-codetools_flowisea.human_name: Master LangChain with No-Code tools - Flowise and LangFlow

web3developmentforbeginners_nocodingskil.description_text:
Welcome to this course, where we demystify the realm of blockchain and programming, tailored for beginners.

We kick off by unraveling the basics of blockchain, seamlessly transitioning into programming to ensure that even newcomers grasp the essentials. As we journey deeper, we delve into advanced topics such as Layer-2 blockchains and the intricacies of Ethereum. Navigate through practical insights into essential blockchain components using tools such as Etherscan. Progressing to NodeJS and JavaScript, we establish the foundation for understanding programming languages vital in the blockchain realm.

You will also learn about the Solidity Fundamentals, equipping you to confidently read and write smart contracts. Uncover programming logic and explore Standards, unraveling the norms that underpin blockchain integrity. The course then delves into the fascinating world of blockchain economics, examining how economic principles shape decentralized ecosystems. Dive into ERC20 tokens, NFTs, supply and demand, markets, and liquidity pools, fostering a holistic comprehension of blockchain dynamics.

By the course’s conclusion, you will possess a robust understanding of blockchain and Web3 fundamentals, empowered with the ability to confidently read, write, and deploy smart contracts using the Solidity programming language.
web3developmentforbeginners_nocodingskil.human_name: Web3 Development for Beginners - No Coding Skills Required

visualdesignofuiandbackendswithawsamplif.description_text:
Dive into the world of full-stack development with AWS Amplify Studio, a powerful toolset that simplifies the process of building robust applications. This course starts by introducing you to the fundamentals of Amplify, covering its advantages and how it fits into the modern development workflow. You will set up your development environment and learn how to use the Amplify CLI to manage backend services.

As you progress, the course will guide you through hands-on projects, such as building a React-based Petstore app. You will explore how to create data models, connect them to UI components, and utilize Figma for designing stunning interfaces. You will also implement complex features like CRUD operations, user authentication, and authorization rules, making your applications both functional and secure. By integrating AWS services for storage and content management, you will learn to handle files and media effectively.

Towards the end, you will deploy and host your application using AWS Amplify Hosting. The course concludes with a cleanup and final review, ensuring you have a clear understanding of the next steps to continue your learning journey. By completing this course, you will have the skills to design and develop full-stack applications with AWS Amplify Studio, ready to tackle real-world projects with confidence.
visualdesignofuiandbackendswithawsamplif.human_name: Visual Design of UI & Backends with AWS Amplify Studio

completemasterclassonpl-900certification.description_text:
Set out on a comprehensive journey through our PL-900 certification course, which equips you with the knowledge you need to pass the PL-900 exam. This course offers over 15 hours of instructional content, 140 pages of study guides, and practice exams, ensuring that you have all the resources required for success. The course aligns closely with the PL-900 curriculum, following the 76 learning objectives defined by Microsoft.

It‘s structured to enhance your chances of passing the exam by systematically addressing each learning objective in sequence, ensuring that you never feel lost. Start by familiarizing yourself with the PL-900 exam and the most effective strategies for success. Then, configure the Power Platform on your computer to prepare your learning environment. Throughout the course, you will dive into understanding the business value and core components of Microsoft Power Platform, master Power BI to create powerful reports and gain valuable insights, develop proficiency in Power Apps for crafting custom business applications, and gain in-depth knowledge of Power Automate to streamline business processes. Additionally, you will explore how to leverage the capabilities of Power Virtual Agents to create efficient chatbots.

By the end of the course, you will be equipped to learn, demonstrate, and apply Power BI capabilities to build sophisticated reports. Join us on this empowering learning journey to unlock your full potential in the Microsoft Power Platform realm.
completemasterclassonpl-900certification.human_name: The Complete Masterclass on PL-900 Certification

mindstudiomastery_automateworkflowsandbu.description_text:
Embark on your AI journey with a detailed introduction to MindStudio, exploring its key features and advantages. You'll start by setting up your MindStudio account and navigating the workspace, providing a strong foundation for your learning. As you progress, you'll build your first AI app from scratch, gaining practical experience in developing and publishing applications.

The course delves into essential building blocks of AI app development, covering functionalities such as chat, custom functions, and logic blocks. You'll also work on real-world projects, including creating customer service chatbots and internal HR bots, ensuring you can apply your skills in practical scenarios. By the end of the course, you'll have the knowledge and expertise to develop and manage advanced AI applications with confidence.
mindstudiomastery_automateworkflowsandbu.human_name: MindStudio Mastery - Automate Workflows and Build Gen AI Apps

ai-900_azureaifundamentalsandtwopractice.description_text:
Dive into the world of Azure AI with our meticulously crafted video course, tailored to empower you with a thorough understanding of artificial intelligence fundamentals and its practical applications in the cloud. This course begins with an introduction to the AI-900 exam contents, guiding you through what to expect and how to prepare effectively. As you progress, you'll explore the distinctions between artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science, and delve into common AI workloads, including machine learning and anomaly detection. The course also covers the application of AI within Microsoft Azure, addressing challenges, risks, and the principles of responsible AI use. Through detailed video content, you'll learn about Azure Machine Learning, Cognitive Services, and how to apply computer vision and natural language processing to solve real-world problems.

The course culminates in practical advice on preparing for the AI-900 exam, featuring example questions and strategies for success. Whether you're a beginner or looking to solidify your knowledge, this course will take you on a journey from foundational concepts to advanced applications, ensuring you're well-prepared for the AI-900 certification.
ai-900_azureaifundamentalsandtwopractice.human_name: AI-900 - Azure AI Fundamentals and Two Practice Tests

creategenai-poweredapps_allwithno-code.description_text:
This course is designed to empower you with the ability to create cutting-edge AI-powered applications using a variety of no-code tools. Starting with an overview of essential no-code platforms such as Bubble, Power Apps, and BuildShip, you'll gain a solid understanding of the tools at your disposal. The course then delves into the practical aspects of building generative AI applications, guiding you step-by-step through the creation of sophisticated chatbots, from a basic PDF-based Q&A bot to a full conversational assistant integrated with Microsoft Teams.

As you progress, you'll explore advanced AI applications like a receipt chatbot and a data assistant, learning how to harness the power of OpenAI’s API, GPT-4 Vision, and other AI technologies. Each module is structured to provide hands-on experience, ensuring that you can apply what you learn to real-world scenarios. By the end of the course, you’ll not only have built multiple AI-driven applications but also acquired the confidence and knowledge to innovate independently.

This course is perfect for professionals and enthusiasts looking to leverage the latest in AI technology without the need for programming skills. Whether you're in tech, business, or a creative field, you'll find the skills taught here invaluable for staying ahead in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.
creategenai-poweredapps_allwithno-code.human_name: Create Gen AI-Powered Apps - All with No-Code

webscrapingtutorialwithscrapyandpythonfo.description_text:
Web scraping is the process of scraping websites and extracting desired data from them, and in this course, you will learn and master web scraping using Python and Scrapy with a step-by-step and in-depth guide.nnThe course starts with introducing you to the web scraping process (with infographics—no code); learn how to scrape data from websites and how to use Scrapy for this. After getting the basics clear, you will perform web scraping using Python and the Scrapy framework! After you have built an actual web scraper, you will get an idea of how web scraping works first-hand. You will then look at the essential concepts of web scraping and Scrapy. Learning how to scrape websites and the essentials already makes you a complete web scraper but you will take this even further and learn the advanced web scraping techniques to become an expert.

Advanced topics such as crawling multiple pages and extracting data—pagination, scraping data using Regular Expressions (RegEx), scraping dynamic or JavaScript-rendered websites using Scrapy Playwright—will be thoroughly explained. Finally, you will perform three projects at the end—Champions League Table [ESPN], Product Tracker [Amazon], and Scraper Application [GUI].nnBy the end of this course, you will have learned how to do web scraping using Python and Scrapy.

All the resource files are added to the GitHub repository at: https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Web-Scraping-Tutorial-with-Scrapy-and-Python-for-Beginners-
webscrapingtutorialwithscrapyandpythonfo.human_name: Web Scraping Tutorial with Scrapy and Python for Beginners

powerautomate_aguidetopowerautomatedeskt.description_text:
The demand for the Microsoft Power Automate platform is rapidly increasing, making it the top choice for medium-to-large companies, alongside PowerApps. This course is divided into beginner, intermediate, expert, and advanced levels for ease of learning. The topics covered in each of the levels are as follows:

  • Introduction: Discover Power Automate Desktop, its robust features, strategies for success, course overview, and valuable reference materials.
  • Beginner Level: Master the creation of fundamental flows, manipulating files and folders, handling text and dates, and leveraging email (Outlook) within your flows.
  • Intermediate Level: Enhance your flows with user inputs, message boxes, advanced conditions, variables, loops, flow action controls, Excel integration, and automating applications through UI automation.
  • Expert Level: Automate web activities using browser automation and recorders, execute database actions through HTTP, extract data from PDF files using OCR, and seamlessly integrate with cloud-based flows.
  • Advanced Level: Achieve system automation, execute CMD actions, script actions with Python and PowerShell, and explore workstation actions for advanced workflow capabilities.

If you are eager to learn and master Microsoft Power Automate Desktop, this comprehensive video course is tailored specifically for you.
powerautomate_aguidetopowerautomatedeskt.human_name: Power Automate - A Guide to Power Automate Desktop

alzheimersresearchuk.description_text:
Without effective treatments, one in three children born today will die with dementia. Today, there are no dementia survivors but research can change this.

Alzheimer’s Research UK is the UK's leading dementia research charity, dedicated to causes, diagnosis, prevention, treatment and cure. Backed by our passionate scientists and supporters, we’re challenging the way people think about dementia, uniting the big thinkers in the field and funding the innovative science that will deliver a cure.

directrelief.description_text:
Donations to support Direct Relief are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Founded in 1948, Direct Relief is a nonprofit, nonpartisan organization that has become one the world’s largest providers of medical relief in the world. Direct Relief works with healthcare professionals and organizations on the ground, establishing partnerships with local organizations that provide health services to people who would otherwise not receive them. Active in all 50 states and in 70 countries, Direct Relief is the only U.S. nonprofit organization licensed and accredited to distribute prescription medications in all 50 U.S. states.  Among its distinctions, Direct Relief has top charity ratings, including four-star and "top-notch" ratings from Charity Navigator, a 100% fundraising efficiency rating from Forbes magazine, and was recently recognized by Fast Company as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Nonprofits in the World.

Direct Relief’s ongoing partnerships allow it to respond fast and expansively in times of emergency, including the devastating earthquakes in Nepal, where it has provided over $28 million (wholesale value) in medical aid to date.  This includes supplies for surgeries and treatment of trauma-related injuries, antibiotics, nutritional items, and other critical medical resources.

Features:

  • Accessories Included: Cap, Glasses, Necklace, Arm Wraps, Glove, Pistol, Holster, Ammopouch, Shoes

More Info

Supports UE: 4.19 - 4.27, 5.0 - 5.4

  • 4k textures for all models, providing high-quality visuals

  • Five bonus photoscanned textures at 4k

zombie_businesssuit.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.25 - 4.27, 5.0 - 5.4

Thousands of unique zombie variations with multiple zombie outfit variations.

Features:

  • Capable of generating thousands of unique zombie variations
  • Offers full control over the variations that are allowed to spawn
  • Includes 34 unique animations
  • Features five demo maps and customized ragdolls and physics assets
  • Comes with 6 Morph Poses - Snarl, MouthControl, Eye Controls
  • Incorporates 3 Custom Gore Masks
  • Offers 8 Zombie Characters with or without hair, merged and optimized, with outfit variations
  • Includes 7 Dismembered Limb Variations
  • Provides 7 Outfit Material Variations
  • Includes a Realistic Skin Material with Detail Mapped Pores and a Fabric Material
  • Features 1 Blood Decal, 1 Animation BP, 1 AI BP, and 1 Dressup BP
  • Rigged to Epic skeleton(IK Bones) and Animated
  • Comes with 8 Master, 21 instances, 1 functions in terms of materials and instances

proceduralvehicles_hatchback.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.25 - 4.27, 5.0 - 5.4

Generate infinite interactable Hatchback variations with flexible, procedurally generated blueprint actors!

Features:

  • Asset includes interactable and drivable vehicles with multiplayer support.
  • Advanced Drivable Blueprint feature offers burnouts, screeching, tire decals, a complete lighting system, engine/tire sounds, and physics.
  • Functional odometer/RPM and animated gear stick/steering wheel for a realistic driving experience.
  • Advanced Interactable Procedural Vehicle Blueprints work with Foliage Actors for dynamic, destructible, and interactable vehicles.
  • Asset comes with ~100 exposed procedural parameters for customization.
  • Foliage and Moss Simulations feature 22 unique foliage meshes and 20 shared foliage meshes per vehicle.
  • Asset includes an Expandable Proxy Mesh System.
  • Custom hand-modeled simplified collision meshes for accurate collisions.
  • Hand-made and calibrated LOD's and single draw-call proxy meshes for performance optimization.
  • Asset includes animations, sound effects, and particles for a game-ready experience.

proceduralvehicles_van.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.22 - 4.27, 5.0 - 5.4

Generate infinite interactable van variations with flexible, procedurally generated blueprint actors!

Features:

  • Interactable and drivable vehicles with multiplayer support
  • Advanced Drivable Blueprint featuring burnouts, screeching, tire decals, a complete lighting system, engine/tire sounds, and satisfying physics
  • Functional odometer/RPM + animated gear stick/steering wheel
  • Advanced Interactable Procedural Vehicle Blueprints that work with Foliage Actors for instanced, dynamic, destructible, and interactable vehicles
  • Destructible components like windows, side mirrors, antenna, wipers
  • Advanced Event Buttons for regenerating selected or all vehicles for rapid iteration and prototyping
  • Customizable paint jobs and moss simulations
  • Expandable Proxy Mesh System with hand-modeled simplified collision meshes
  • Animated, sound effects, and particles for game-ready optimization
  • Procedural Vehicle Generation with ~100 exposed parameters for customization
  • Instanced Dynamic Meshes for seamless swapping of static and movable meshes
  • Foliage Tools and Integration for painting and procedurally generating interactable vehicles into your map
  • Highly detailed interior, bottom/base, and engine included with flat tire variations
  • Sound effects for lootable interactions, doors, leaves, glass, engine, and tires
  • Smart Actors that detect player distance, use minimal resources when idle, and self-clean with various optimization levels

policecar_drivable.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.25 - 4.27, 5.0 - 5.4

This is an American style police car, with a multiplayer-ready driving. Sounds, lights, animations and particles are included.

Features:

  • Advanced Drivable Blueprint: Includes features like burnouts, screeching, tire decals, a complete lighting system (headlights/night-mode, brakes, indicators), engine/tire sounds, and physics. Also supports character controller switching.
  • Fully replicated for multiplayer: Functions for both single-player and multiplayer are included.
  • Functional odometer/RPM + animated gear stick/steering wheel: Offers a realistic driving experience.
  • Animated, sound effects, sirens, particles: Enhances the gaming experience and makes the asset more realistic.
  • Custom Skeleton and Skeletal Mesh: Includes a fully rigged Skeletal Mesh version of the vehicle with a custom skeleton and bones for each individual wheel, door, steering wheel, gear stick, boot, and hood.
  • Interior and Bonuses: A high detailed interior, bottom/base, and engine are included. Flat tire variations are included and tires can be removed completely with 3D suspension and axles being visible.
  • Modifiable Number Plates: Intentionally left blank so you can modify the texture, or attach your own model to suit your game's world.
  • Texture Resolutions: 4k for most textures, providing high-quality visuals.
  • Collision: Custom/Automatically Generated, ensuring accurate interaction with the environment.
  • 3 Demo Maps: Allows you to test and experience the asset's features in different environments.

directrelief.description_text:
Donations to support Direct Relief are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Founded in 1948, Direct Relief is a nonprofit, nonpartisan organization that has become one the world’s largest providers of medical relief in the world. Direct Relief works with healthcare professionals and organizations on the ground, establishing partnerships with local organizations that provide health services to people who would otherwise not receive them. Active in all 50 states and in 70 countries, Direct Relief is the only U.S. nonprofit organization licensed and accredited to distribute prescription medications in all 50 U.S. states.  Among its distinctions, Direct Relief has top charity ratings, including four-star and "top-notch" ratings from Charity Navigator, a 100% fundraising efficiency rating from Forbes magazine, and was recently recognized by Fast Company as one of the Top 10 Most Innovative Nonprofits in the World.

Direct Relief’s ongoing partnerships allow it to respond fast and expansively in times of emergency, including the devastating earthquakes in Nepal, where it has provided over $28 million (wholesale value) in medical aid to date.  This includes supplies for surgeries and treatment of trauma-related injuries, antibiotics, nutritional items, and other critical medical resources.

Create a variety of fun zombie scenarios limited only by your imagination. This Flash Sale Bundle is great for professionals or hobbyists looking to create in Unreal and save some money.
